name: Rainy Cactus
description:
Rainy Cactus Description

Rainy Cactus is an interactive toy. This cactus is special. It needs a lot more water than others do, but will grow up instantly if you provide it with extra water.

Credits

I worked alone on this project, but I used lots of resources other great people provide to the whole world:

Rain audio was found on BigSoundBank.com.

Sound effect when picking up rain is cut from this audio shared under Creative Commons license.

Chime sound is cut from this audio shared under Creative Commons license.

Sound logo by Kenney.
